variable.name: subjid
variable.description: Subject ID
variable.comment: Genotyped QC duplicates share the same SUBJID but are distinguished by SAMPID in genotype files.

variable.name: consent
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: affection_status
variable.description: Case - control status of the subject

variable.name: hivstat
variable.description: HIV status

variable.name: ViralLoad_cperml
variable.description: Viral Load Copies/mL

variable.name: ViralLoad_Log10
variable.description: Viral Log 10

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Participant reported sex

variable.name: race
variable.description: Self-reported ancestry of participant

variable.name: age
variable.description: Reported age of participant

variable.name: age_cat
variable.description: Age strata used in frequency matching (</=37, 38-45, 46+)

variable.name: year
variable.description: Year participated in UHS (1986-2002)

variable.name: year_cat
variable.description: Year strata used in frequency matching (</= 1994; 1995+)

variable.name: lca_group
variable.description: Latent Class Analysis (LCA) assigned HIV risk group used in frequency matching
variable.value: High needle share and sti risk

variable.name: mpartners
variable.description: Multiple sex partners in the past year, indicator used in LCA

variable.name: stis
variable.description: Ever had sexually transmitted disease (excluding HIV), indicator used in LCA

variable.name: anal
variable.description: Had receptive anal sex in the past 6 months, indicator used in LCA

variable.name: needleshare
variable.description: Sharing needles in the past 30 days, indicator used in LCA

variable.name: sexwork
variable.description: Participant ever traded sex for drugs or money, indicator used in LCA

variable.name: site
variable.description: Blinded site indicator - site 1 vs. 2

variable.name: sampid
variable.description: Serum Sample ID

variable.name: gwassex
variable.description: Genotype identified sex
variable.value: Self-report male, genotype female - inconsistent self-report of gender across waves, primarily reported male

variable.name: cluster
variable.description: Record identified as individual appearing multiple times as inadvertant duplicate.
variable.comment: Records with equivalent cluster number are records of the same person at different survey waves.

variable.name: final_analysis
variable.description: Unique individual who was selected for inclusion in the investigators' final analysis data set, based on passing QC and having complete phenotype and covariate data.
